dct_title_s: Map of Maumee River Basin (middle portion) showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Maumee River Basin (Middle portion)
dct_description_sm: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
"Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water, from data compiled by Lawrence R. Brunstetter".
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Maumee River Basin (middle portion) and the quality of underground water.
